title: 1000-Lb Sisters Tammy Slaton Reveals If She Finally Loves Herself Amid New Living Situation & Weight Loss Transformation
text: [1000-Lb Sisters](https://screenrant.com/tag/1000-lb-sisters) star Tammy Slaton delivered a powerful and inspiring message to her followers, which included a reminder about self-love. Tammy and her family have [starred on 1000-Lb Sisters since 2000](https://screenrant.com/tammy-slaton-grown-1000-lb-sisters-season-1/). She and Amy are the two most prominent cast members, as their reality show has featured their extraordinary weight loss journeys. [Tammy recently announced she lost 500 pounds](https://screenrant.com/1000-lb-sisters-tammy-slaton-dramatic-full-length-photos-500-pound-weight-loss-journey-pictures/). At a recent doctor's appointment, which was shown on 1000-Lb Sisters, conversations have started over when Tammy can undergo skin removal surgery. 1000-Lb Sisters ' Tammy Slaton sent a powerful message to her followers about pushing through life's many obstacles and overcoming struggles. In her latest Instagram post, [Tammy](https://www.instagram.com/queentammy86/reel/DCC1_juy76c/) shared a video that showed her looking directly at the camera and sending a powerful message to her social media followers about pushing through life's many obstacles and overcoming struggles. In the post's caption, she talked about the need to build strength and resilience, and mentioned that the "path to becoming the best version of yourself" is to build up "self-love," which is a trait that she has finally gained on her weight loss journey. She reminded her fans that "every step forward counts," even though it won't always be easy. Tammy added that everybody struggling to overcome various challenges owes it "to yourself to keep going, to keep growing and to never settle." The 1000-Lb Sisters star ended her Instagram post by telling her fans to keep pushing forward, to keep believing in themselves and to never forget that they are "capable of amazing things." Over 15,000 people have liked the post so far, and over 400 of them replied in the comments section saying how inspiring Tammy is; some even said they needed to hear this message today. What Tammy Slatonâ€™s Inspiring Message About Building Self-Love Means Tammy's Transformation Isn't Just About Losing Weight Tammy has come a long way since 1000-Lb Sisters first debuted in 2020. She wasn't happy with her life, and she was more prone to negativity. The most obvious shift in her transformation is her weight loss. She has lost at least 500 pounds at this point, an accomplishment that should be applauded. The more weight she loses, the more she gains more and more control over her life. Part of that control includes [Tammy's mental health and well-being](https://screenrant.com/1000-lb-sisters-tammy-slaton-mental-health-struggles-weight-loss-journey-physical-emotional-well-being/). The 1000-Lb Sisters star is a lot more happy and positive now. She's finally loving life again and, more important, loves herself now. That talk of building up "self-love" in her Instagram post is possible because she has managed to instill that in herself first. Our Take On Tammy Slaton Becoming The Best Version Of Herself Tammy Wants To Be An Inspiration To Her Fans Tammy is at a point in her journey where she wants to give back to the community. She is an inspiration to so many people, as evidenced by the numerous online comments from her fans. Now that she knows she can accomplish anything, she wants to ensure that other people know they can do it too. It takes a lot of hard work and determination, but if you can manage to overcome these hurdles, then the rewards on the other side are worth it. 1000-Lb SIsters airs Tuesdays at 9 p.m. EST on TLC.
